publicationStmt.p: Custom TEI ODD for bilingual dramatic texts with English/Spanish correspondence rules

schemaSpec.desc: TEI ODD for Bilingual Drama. This ODD customizes TEI All to enforce specific rules for bilingual dramatic texts with English and Spanish correspondence between speech and stage elements.

elementSpec.desc: Speech element customized to require bilingual correspondence attributes

attDef.desc: Language code restricted to English (eng) or Spanish (spa)
Unique identifier required for correspondence linking
Correspondence reference to parallel element in other language, must begin with #

elementSpec.desc: Stage direction element customized with bilingual correspondence attributes, but requirements are enforced only via Schematron (not RNG).

attDef.desc: Language code restricted to English (eng) or Spanish (spa)
Identifier (required only in Schematron for non-nested stage)
Correspondence reference (required only in Schematron for non-nested stage)

constraintSpec.desc: Schematron rules enforcing bilingual correspondence patterns

sch:rule.sch:assert: The @corresp attribute must begin with a hash (#).
English sp elements must have @xml:id ending with '_eng'.
English sp elements must have @corresp ending with '_spa'.
Spanish sp elements must have @xml:id ending with '_spa'.
Spanish sp elements must have @corresp ending with '_eng'.

sch:assert.test: not(@xml:lang='eng') or substring(@xml:id, 1, string-length(@xml:id) - 4) = substring(@corresp, 2, string-length(@corresp) - 5)

sch:rule.sch:assert: English sp: @xml:id and @corresp must be identical except for language suffixes (_eng vs _spa) and # prefix.

sch:assert.test: not(@xml:lang='spa') or substring(@xml:id, 1, string-length(@xml:id) - 4) = substring(@corresp, 2, string-length(@corresp) - 5)

sch:rule.sch:assert: Spanish sp: @xml:id and @corresp must be identical except for language suffixes (_spa vs _eng) and # prefix.
Stage elements not nested in sp must have @xml:lang.
Stage elements not nested in sp must have @xml:lang value of 'eng' or 'spa'.
Stage elements not nested in sp must have @xml:id.
Stage elements not nested in sp must have @corresp.
The @corresp attribute must begin with a hash (#).
English stage elements must have @xml:id ending with '_eng'.
English stage elements must have @corresp ending with '_spa'.
Spanish stage elements must have @xml:id ending with '_spa'.
Spanish stage elements must have @corresp ending with '_eng'.

sch:assert.test: not(@xml:lang='eng') or substring(@xml:id, 1, string-length(@xml:id) - 4) = substring(@corresp, 2, string-length(@corresp) - 5)

sch:rule.sch:assert: English stage: @xml:id and @corresp must be identical except for language suffixes (_eng vs _spa) and # prefix.

sch:assert.test: not(@xml:lang='spa') or substring(@xml:id, 1, string-length(@xml:id) - 4) = substring(@corresp, 2, string-length(@corresp) - 5)

sch:rule.sch:assert: Spanish stage: @xml:id and @corresp must be identical except for language suffixes (_spa vs _eng) and # prefix.
